pullRequest.title: CB-9503 - Env creation fails with private endpoint when created with …
pullRequest.bodyText:
…restricted resource group permissions
Contains 2 fixes:

sets the deployment status properly after exception
delegates the original exception to reach the UI

commit.message: CB-9503 - Env creation fails with private endpoint when created with restricted resource group permissions

nodes.bodyText: Just for clarification: why is poll for creation started when an exception is thrown? I have not found a catch clause in calling methods, I guess the creation will fail.
Another question: in case there was no permission to create a DNS zone, how come this error message was shown to the user? How did the deployment get deleted?
